name: Do Not Fall! (Minigames)
description:
"Do Not Fall" is a collection of minigames, either inspired by others or completely made by myself! The minigames' goal is as the name suggests: don't fall! The game is still being actively developed, and many features are planned to be added!

You can join my Discord server if you have any questions, feedback, reports, suggestions, or merely want to flex your insanely high score, or maybe to receive updates!

I am a new dev and this is my first public project, very happy to share this game on here!
